LanguageData.ATR_OpportunitySite_ArchotechArrival.roo: The mysterious signal beckoning you to the crashsite of the ominous meterorite has suddenly ceased. The quest [resolvedQuestName] has expired.
LanguageData.ATR_OpportunitySite_ArchotechArrival.que: questDescription->With a screetching roar, a fiery ball of metal hurtles through the sky. The very air seems to quake. It did not seem to come from space. Eventually, it lands beyond the horizon - and yet somehow its exact landing spot is known to you. What could possibly be beckoning you there, and for what purpose? \nInexplicably, you sense that [allSitePartsDescriptionsExceptFirst]
